name: Susie's Smokestack Skirmish
description:
Story:-Susie's gone nuts and now she wants to challenge a governor with no wits and grits but with crazy steampunk and airships!!  Concept:-Typically a game is having levels of adventure but in this game, the boss battle is your only battle and level for the game which is not real Rules:- -Click the mouse to fire.  -Use arrow keys to move in respective directions. -Try to grab power-ups when they appear! Fireballs inflict double damage! Water balloons splash onto multiple foes and can extinguish fireballs!  -⚡When Susie tries to shoot you with lightning, use the lightning cannon to reroute the bolt right back at her! The web build is available to play, but just for fun, I have ported it to Windows, Mac and Linux with Android Build coming soon after the jam... The install is as follows-
  1. Install instructions
  2. Download .zip file
  3. Place in a folder on you desktop
  4. Right click > Extract Here
  5. Click on the application-Chaotic Cursor Crisis 
  6. Sit back & get crazyI
f you have problems, or you're on MAC / LINUX / VIRUS WARNING, comment in the jam comments or on this game main page Inspiration:-Operation Patchwork(originally made by Metorid Games) Credits:- Music-Music from Brandon Fietcher and Plants vs. Zombies 2 Art-Metroid Games,Death Screen from Dank wizards by Metroid Games  Code-Metroid Games (Unfortunately, due to the time constraints, only the basic game works and is polished. I had no time for a start menu and extra physicality for the game) Made in 3 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 Theme- It is not real.
